answer: Snake Plants should be watered every 2–3 weeks, allowing the soil to dry out completely between waterings.
Aloe Vera thrives in bright, direct sunlight. Place it near a sunny window.
Peace Lilies prefer medium indirect light and need watering about once a week.
Spider Plants enjoy bright, indirect light and weekly watering. Avoid direct sun to prevent leaf burn.
ZZ Plants tolerate low light and need watering only every 2–3 weeks. Let soil dry between waterings.
